description: PressMate AI walks a PR manager through extracting a product recall brief, applying a crisis‑communication style guide, generating SEO keywords, drafting, proofreading, formatting, creating a media list, and scheduling the release on PRNewswire.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that converts internal briefings, style guides, and SEO keywords into brand‑compliant press releases, generates media lists, and schedules distribution.

We need a press release for a product recall of our Model X smartwatch because of a battery overheating issue. Here is the internal briefing:

---
Subject: Urgent Recall – Model X Smartwatch Battery Overheat
Date: 2025-12-01
From: Product Safety Team

We have identified a defect in the lithium‑ion battery of the Model X smartwatch that can cause overheating and, in rare cases, fire. All units shipped between 2023‑01‑01 and 2025‑03‑31 are affected (~150,000 units). We will offer a free replacement battery kit and a prepaid return label. The recall will begin on 2025‑12‑10. A press release must be issued immediately using our crisis‑communication template. Use the style guide at https://example.com/styleguide/crisis.json. Schedule the release for 2025‑12‑15T09:00:00Z on PRNewswire.
Got it. I’ll start by extracting the key event details from your briefing.

We have identified a defect in the lithium‑ion battery of the Model X smartwatch that can cause overheating and, in rare cases, fire. All units shipped between 2023‑01‑01 and 2025‑03‑31 are affected (~150,000 units). We will offer a free replacement battery kit and a prepaid return label. The recall will begin on 2025‑12‑10. A press release must be issued immediately using our crisis‑communication template. Use the style guide at https://example.com/styleguide/crisis.json. Schedule the release for 2025‑12‑15T09:00:00Z on PRNewswire.

messages.content: {"title":"Urgent Recall – Model X Smartwatch Battery Overheat","date":"2025-12-10","affected_units":"~150,000 units shipped between 2023‑01‑01 and 2025‑03‑31","issue":"Battery overheating that may cause fire","action":"Free replacement battery kit and prepaid return label","release_date":"2025-12-15T09:00:00Z","company":"[Your Company]","product":"Model X Smartwatch"}
Event details extracted. Next, I’ll fetch your crisis‑communication style guide.
Style guide loaded. I’ll now generate SEO‑optimized keywords for the recall.
["Model X smartwatch recall","smartwatch battery safety","lithium ion battery recall","free battery replacement","product safety announcement","consumer electronics recall"]
SEO keywords ready. I’ll draft the press release using the extracted details, style guide, and keywords.

event_details.title: Urgent Recall – Model X Smartwatch Battery Overheat
event_details.issue: Battery overheating that may cause fire
event_details.action: Free replacement battery kit and prepaid return label

messages.content:
Headline: Model X Smartwatch Recall – Battery Overheat Issue

Subhead: [Your Company] initiates voluntary recall of 150,000 units and offers free replacement kits.

Dateline: CITY, STATE – December 10, 2025 –

Body:
[Your Company] announced today a voluntary recall of its Model X smartwatch due to a defect in the lithium‑ion battery that may cause overheating and, in rare cases, fire. The issue affects approximately 150,000 units shipped between January 1, 2023 and March 31, 2025.

Customers who own a Model X smartwatch should immediately stop using the device and contact the recall hotline at 1‑800‑555‑0199. A free replacement battery kit and prepaid return label will be provided. The recall will begin on December 10, 2025 and continue until all affected units have been addressed.

“Safety is our top priority,” said Jane Doe, Chief Product Safety Officer at [Your Company]. “We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and are committed to resolving the issue swiftly and transparently.”

Boilerplate:
[Your Company] is a leading provider of consumer technology products, dedicated to innovation, quality, and customer safety. For more information, visit https://www.example.com.

Contact:
John Smith, Media Relations
Phone: 1‑800‑555‑0199
Email: press@example.com

Keywords: Model X smartwatch recall, smartwatch battery safety, lithium ion battery recall, free battery replacement, product safety announcement, consumer electronics recall
Draft prepared. I’ll run a proofread to catch any grammar, tone, or readability issues.
